name: paper-radio-button

events.name: change
events.description: Fired when the checked state changes due to user interaction.

events.name: core-change
events.description: Fired when the checked state changes.

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: Gets or sets the state, `true` is checked and `false` is unchecked.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The label for the radio button.

attributes.name: toggles
attributes.description:
Normally the user cannot uncheck the radio button by tapping once
checked.  Setting this property to `true` makes the radio button
toggleable from checked to unchecked.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If true, the user cannot interact with this element.
